title: Temple of Amun-Re relief carving and hieroglyphics

content.prompt: Which of the following aspects of ancient Egyptian beliefs is reflected in the program of relief carvings and hieroglyphics that cover the interior and exterior surfaces of the temple complex?

choices.label: The temple priests were the sole intercessors between gods and humans.
The pharaoh possessed divinely granted power to maintain order on earth.
Egyptian gods were in constant conflict with foreign deities.
Ordinary humans could reign as gods in the afterlife.

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
